::Rust::

Rust raises an arm to block the optic lasers, the force pushing him 
back and making him trip over a tree, an arrow whizzing by half an 
inch from his head. He looks at Aerotaur.

"This criminal attacked us!" he exclaims, holding his fire for a 
second, "We were deffending ourselves."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
> With lightning fast reflexes he removes two of the parts that 
assemble into 
> his bow (actually the parts that form the quiver) and reforms them 
into the 
> equivelent of a shield. It formed a magnetic barrier that diflected 
the beams 
> skyward.
